Sarge drew his rifle.

Sarge: Deemos is mine. I'm in charge here...

  ----=
- Original Message ----- 
  From: gunthers8@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yaho=
ogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, June 30, 2001 6:58 PM
  Subject: Re: Chivtro=
n Decisions




  Grounded thought hard for a bit. "All right, I announce n=
ow the death 
  sentence on Deemos for crimes first and second degree murde=
r.  It is 
  now, your duty to kill him, Aerotaur.  Not a savage grudge, bu=
t a law 
  announced. We will not kill like ancient transformeres.  His so =

  called, lackeys, also have a death sentence for protecting aiding a 
  f=
ellons escape.  Does this suit you both."
  --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y=
... wrote:
  > Trinity::
  > 
  > "When wiull we started to train Uncle Aer=
otaur?????" said Trinity
  > 
  > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
=
  > > ::Aerotaur::
  > >     "I'm sorry Grounded but Deemos has hurt us too=
 many times for 
  > me to let 
  > > him live.  This is all because I let =
him go the first time he 
  > attacked.  As 
  > > for you Sarge, I have ju=
st as much reason to kill him.  In our 
  last 
  > fight I 
  > > lost an =
arm and a leg defending others.  I nearly died because 
  > there were 
  >=
 > bots in the battle that shouldn't have been there.  I couldn't 
  care 
=
  > less 
  > > about his lackeys.  Now then, let's get to the meeting so w=
e can 
  > finish it 
  > > and start planning our attack."  He stands tall=
 glaring at Sarge.
